mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.task_userid AS "taskUserid", a.task_name AS "taskName", a.task_price AS "taskPrice", a.task_amount AS "taskAmount", a.task_yxsj AS "taskYxsj", a.task_ask AS "taskAsk", a.task_skill AS "taskSkill", a.task_phone AS "taskPhone", a.task_qq AS "taskQq", a.task_type AS "taskType", a.task_rztype AS "taskRztype", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.task_remarks AS "taskRemarks", a.task_reserve1 AS "taskReserve1", a.task_reserve2 AS "taskReserve2", a.task_reserve3 AS "taskReserve3", a.task_reserve4 AS "taskReserve4", a.task_reserve5 AS "taskReserve5", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
